briefTitle: Evaluating an Endocrine Therapy Dose-frequency Escalation Strategy and Its Effects on Tolerability and Compliance
officialTitle: A Pragmatic Randomised, Trial Evaluating an Endocrine Therapy Dose-frequency Escalation Strategy and Its Effects on Tolerability and Compliance (REaCT-TEMPO)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with an early stage or locally advanced hormonal receptor positive breast cancer
* Plan to receive endocrine therapy
* Able to provide oral consent
* Willing and able to complete questionnaires as per study protocol

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic cancer
* Adjuvant abemaciclib
